Class LevelFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • LevelFileReader

  • public class LevelFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which reads levels from files, and saves levels to file.
    Author:
    James McWilliams

      • getDropRates

        public static int[] getDropRates()
        dropRates will contain exactly 8 ints, each representing the odds of a certain power being given to the player. These powers are, in order: Bombs, Gas, Sterilisation items, Poison, Male sex changes, Female sex changes, No-entry signs, and Death rats.
        Returns:
        dropRates the chances that each power will drop.

      • getInProgTimer

        public static int getInProgTimer()

      • getInProgInv

        public static int[] getInProgInv()
        Gets the items in a player's saved inventory. The powers are in the following order: Bombs, Gas, Sterilisation items, Poison, Male sex changes, Female sex changes, No-entry signs, and Death rats.
        Returns:

      • saveLevel

        public static void saveLevel(java.lang.String levelName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a level to a .txt file in a format that can be read back by the file reader.
        Parameters:
        levelName - The name for the level. Formatted as "level-X-USER.txt" where X is a number and USER is the profile's name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it can't find the file specified.

      • ratToStr

        public static java.lang.String ratToStr(Rat rat)
        Turns a rat into a string that can be pasted into a level file to be loaded later.
        Parameters:
        rat - The rat to convert
        Returns:
        A string that can be read by the file reader

      • powerToStr

        public static java.lang.String powerToStr(Power power)
        Turns a power into a string that can be pasted into a level file to be loaded later.
        Parameters:
        power - The power to convert
        Returns:
        A string that can be read by the file reader

      • loadLevelFile

        public static void loadLevelFile(java.lang.String filename)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads game objects from the text in level files.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to open.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file can't be found.
